parameters.definition: Total acres available for growing fruits
Minimum acres of apples that must be grown
Minimum acres of pears that must be grown
Profit per acre of growing apples
Profit per acre of growing pears
Maximum ratio of pears to apples in growing

description: Ben is growing apples and pears on his orchard. He has \param{TotalAcres} acres available on which he must grow a minimum of \param{MinApples} acres of apples and a minimum of \param{MinPears} acres of pears to meet demands. The profit per acre of apple is \$\param{ProfitApple} and the profit per acre of pear is \$\param{ProfitPear}. He prefers to grow more pears than apples but limitations in his workforce allow him to grow at most \param{MaxPearsToApplesRatio} times the amount of pears as apples. How many of each fruit should Ben grow in order to maximize his profit? What is that profit?
